title: The difference between a dream and a huge dream

preview.html: What is the difference between a vision and pipe dreams? When a person is confused in determining the real vision or the fact that the dream is a dream, you may also be interested in knowing about tomatoes in a dream, and it should be noted that there is a dead person who does not know the meaning of dreams, and the difference between them and a dream is enormous, so Through the summit website, we will provide you with the most important details. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing a promise in a dream What is the difference between a vision, dreams, and self-talk? A person is confused in determining the differences between a vision, a dream, and inner speech, and it is difficult for him to determine the type of dream he saw, because of the similarity between them Very close. Among the differences between them: The vision itself is a reliable thing that arises from a pure mind and a great mind. And the speech of the soul is what a person aspires to achieve and desires for it to happen, and God knows best. But on the other hand, illusory dreams or what are called false dreams mean hallucinations, and according to Islam, they are said to be among Satan. As for dreams, self-talk, and heavy dreams, these are all forms of dreams that the sleeper sees, but each of them has a different interpretation from the other, and an educated advisor and an experienced jurist can distinguish them. In religious matters. What does a vision mean? In the context of discussing the difference between a dream and a dream, a dream is a message from God that comes in the form of a sermon or warning to people who believe in Him and love His great self. The evidence for this is his saying, may God bless him and grant him peace: “Whoever sees me in a dream sees only me and does not want Satan to appear in my image.” The Muslim narrates. As for the types of vision, they can be divided as follows: A direct section that does not need explanation. A dream that has a meaning in itself and therefore needs to be interpreted by scholars and religious people. The same applies to the vision of our Master Joseph when he saw 11 stars in the sun and the moon, and everyone bowed to him And God knows best. With this, God sends his warnings to his servant that he sees in his sleep that he should pay attention and pay attention to what he saw. An example of this warning vision is the one mentioned in Surah Yusuf. God Almighty said: {Then the king said: I have seen seven fat cows being eaten by seven lean cows. Read more: Interpretation of seeing smallpox in a dream What do poop dreams mean? Continuing to discuss the difference between dreams and dreams, interpretation scholars explained The terrifying nightmares that a person sees in a dream are false dreams or so-called lost dreams. This is when he sees what scares him in his dream so that he does not tell anyone about his dream, and God knows best. The evidence for this is that one of the companions told the Messenger that he saw his head cut off while he was following it, so the Messenger rebuked him and said: Satan is playing with you in a dream, and God knows best. You may be interested in: Seeing furniture The house and the room in a dreamSelf-talk and its meaningIn conjunction with mentioning the difference between dreams and dreams, this type of dream means that the person sees in the dream what he wants in reality, for example: A woman who has delayed childbearing sees that she is pregnant or that she has given birth. A beautiful child or girl. Likewise, someone who is looking for a job and whose work is difficult dreams of traveling or working in an aristocratic place. This is also the case with...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a bag in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream for a single woman: The bag is considered one of the important things in our lives, where important things are kept. This is for fear that these things will be stolen or lost. The student uses the bag to put his books, stationery, and everything he needs in it, and he wears it when he goes to school or university. A bag in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a bag in a dream for a single woman. A bag in a dream shows the positive changes that are occurring in this girl’s life, and the interpretation of this dream could be a sign of this girl’s engagement and engagement soon: This girl will soon communicate with a man who has good morals, And he lives with him in happiness and stability. There are also changes in her life that change her life for the better and for the better. In addition, this dream indicates that this girl cares a lot about her appearance. In addition, she can achieve her dreams and goals that she seeks to achieve. Moreover, she excels She is very involved in her scientific life. She will also marry a rich man if she has a shiny and shining bag. Moreover, she can plan well for her future and make appropriate plans for it. She is also very social and wants to create many relationships with the people around her. It is also very serious. And practical. See also: Interpretation of seeing fruit in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of a dream about a pink bag. The interpretation of this vision is due to the color in which this bag appears in the dream, and this dream is interpreted according to the situation in which the person who sees this dream is, and here are the most important of these interpretations related to this A dream is a dream: A single girl excels in many aspects of her life, and gets the highest grades in her studies. He can also achieve his goals and dreams that he seriously pursues. In addition, this girl takes responsibility for herself and can solve her problems. A married woman also gets rid of troubles and problems. Which she was suffering from and lives her life with stability and happiness in her life. Moreover, the divorced woman lives her life happily, and has a lot of money and food. Moreover, there is a strong love relationship between the man and his wife and they live together happily. Also, the pregnant woman is approaching her date Her birth and the gender of the baby is often female. The man also obtains a prestigious position in an important institution or company that has a place in society. In addition, the unmarried young man gets the opportunity to travel, which changes many things in his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a new house in A dream and its repercussions: Dreaming of a new bag in a dream. The interpretation of this dream indicates that there is a new job opportunity in the life of the person who sees this dream. The date of the wedding of a single girl with a young man with good intentions and good performance is approaching. Likewise, a married woman will soon become pregnant, especially if she does not have children from Before.A married man gets many positive changes in his life and his life changes for the better.This man also moves to a new house, he sees in

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying someone I know

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about marrying someone I know. It is known that the dream is a natural state that occurs in a person in a state of relaxation and sleep, and the dream of marriage is one of the dreams that usually occurs with girls who do this. This is a dream about bringing joy and happiness to a girl’s heart. There are dreams that are a vision from God Almighty, some of which are the result of excessive thinking before sleeping, and they can be nightmares and other dreams that are different and varied. What is the interpretation of a dream about marrying a single person I know? A dream about getting married is considered one of the dreams. Praiseworthy, and it is generally good and not objectionable, and there are many different interpretations of the dream of marriage in a dream, as its interpretation for an unmarried girl comes in many places that arose as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she will get married, this is a change in her life. For the better. A girl’s marriage to a well-known person is evidence of her marriage to a good person. When a girl sees that she is marrying someone she knows and she is sad, this is evidence that she is thinking about her fears. What is the interpretation of seeing a man getting married in a dream? The interpretation of a dream about a man getting married in a dream differs from the interpretation of seeing a man getting married in a dream. The marriage of a girl, and its interpretation varies according to the situation in which the girl is married, and therefore the interpretation of the marriage of a man is as follows: If a man sees that he has married a dead woman, this is evidence that he will achieve many things that he lost hope in. And if he sees him married to one of his mahrams, it is proven that he will be blessed with Hajj. Or Umrah. If a man sees that his wife has married another man, this is evidence that he will obtain a lot of money. And if he sees him married to an unknown girl, this is evidence of his success in achieving his goals. What is the interpretation of marrying someone in a dream to someone you love? It should be noted There are many girls who dream of marrying someone they love, as this dream has many different meanings and interpretations that depend on the situation in which the dreamer sees himself in the dream, and therefore here is the interpretation of marriage for him. Girls with someone he loves and it came as follows: If an unmarried girl sees that she will marry someone she loves, this is evidence that she will marry this person soon. For a single girl to see in her dream that she is marrying someone she loves in reality is evidence that she loves this person very much and is afraid that Lose it. Seeing a girl in her dream wearing a wedding dress and marrying someone she loves and she was happy, then the interpretation of the dream is that she will marry this person soon. There is no doubt that the interpretation of marriage in a dream is related to the situation that the dreamer sees in the dream, as it is generally considered a positive dream as stated by scholars It is considered one of the real things in life that many people see. Girls dream about it.

title: Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream: Rodents are living organisms spread throughout the world, but rodents differ from one place to another and from one environment to another. Seeing rodents such as mice in a dream disturbs the dreamer, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about seeing and killing mice in a dreamThe mouse is one of the rodents whose sight actually causes a feeling of fear and disgust in people and causes a lot of anxiety and fear when they dream of it. Because the mouse is an animal that causes many diseases and health problems. Her entry into a man's house entails a lot of trouble and spoiling the food. Drink, clothing and facility. Just as mice in reality represent a harbinger of disaster, seeing them in a dream is a sign of bad luck and corruption in life. Religion and fame in and around his life If one sees in his dream that many mice are gathering in one place, it means that there are many good people living in that place. If one sees in a dream that there are mice escaping from his house, it means that poverty has Arriving at one's home and one is unable to spend on it, but if one chases mice in one's sleep, this is an indication of one's longevity. In life. Ibn Sirin also pointed out that whoever sees in a dream that there is a mouse in his sleep, this is evidence that his wife is a woman of no good and he is deceiving her in his home. An arrow or any weapon shows rape of a woman or forbidden to have intercourse with her, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mouse in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that there is a black mouse, this means that she will face many marital problems with her husband. As if this black mouse was small. If the married woman was able to kill him, this indicates that there is a person with bad intentions in her life, but he is weak in the ability to harm her, which makes her able to get rid of him. Of which. From it, her happiness, stability for her family, and peace of mind will be restored to her soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mouse in a dream for a married girl: Seeing a group of mice in a married girl’s dream indicates that there is an important matter that occupies her mind and makes her think constantly. of living and a sharp rise in prices. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gray mouse in a dream. A black or gray mouse in a dream indicates the presence of a large number of hypocrites in the dreamer’s life who envy him, hate his life, and harbor evil in their hearts. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white mouse in a dream. A white mouse appears in a dream to indicate A severe shortage of money and livelihood, and that the dreamer is suffering from poverty and need, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a yellow mouse in a dream. Whoever sees a yellow mouse in his dream, this is a warning that someone from the dreamer’s family, children, or relatives will suffer from a serious illness and loss of his health, and the matter may reach the point of His death is at the mercy of God Almighty, and God Almighty. Larger. And He knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a red mouse in a dream: A red mouse in a dream indicates the death of a relative or friend of the dreamer, and God knows best. We present to you a summary

title: Seeing a dead person in a dream while talking to someone alive

preview.html: And the dreamer who is going through some problems and pressures in his daily life sees that he will get rid of them all, and will live with great comfort from his affairs, God willing. We will show you through the interpreter website the meaning and interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is still talking, so follow us. The interpretation of seeing a dead man alive talking with a girl. In a dream, if an unmarried woman sees a dead person near her and talks to her about her life in the dream and she is happy. It is a sign that she will feel very comfortable in all her affairs, and will get rid of the pressures she is going through. And an unmarried girl who looks in a dream at the unknown dead person, and he may talk to her in the dream. And he did not care. It indicates that she is on the right path in her life, but she did not listen to others and tries to avoid them, and God knows best. And if an unmarried woman looks at her work in the dream, then the dead person speaks to her, and he did not hear him in the dream, nor did he look at him. title: Interpretation of a fish in a dream - the meaning of seeing fish in a dream

preview.html: Fish in a dream, for a pregnant woman, for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a divorced woman, whether for the living dead, or raw, grilled, cooked and fried. Ibn Sirin and others eat fish. If in a dream the number of them is known, then they are women, and if their number is not known, then they are money and spoils. As for the whale, it is the king’s servant, the sea is the king, and the fish is the king’s army. The fish was alive and tender, indicating virginity. Whoever dreams of catching a big fish, this indicates benefit and goodness. Fish and soft shells are the best guide for anyone who wants to be resourceful. Fish and brown are the best guide for those who want to get married. Dead fish in the sea is a bad sign and indicates a hope that will not be fulfilled. Whoever sees a fish in his bed, it is bad evidence for someone walking on the sea or for someone who is sick. Anyone who catches fish from murky water is in severe pain. Whoever was seen eating live fish reached the king. Although they eat salted fish they are badly damaged. It was said: If the fish reach four, then they are women, and if there are more than four: spoils and money. Fried fish indicates a response to an invitation, and it is said that fried fish is a journey in search of knowledge. Whoever sees that he is buying a fish from a fish, he will buy a slave girl or marry a woman. If the fish moves from the fresh sea to the salt sea and the salty sea fish to the fresh sea, this indicates hypocrisy. Young and old fish show interest in marriage and heartbreak. If a grilled fish descends on him from the sky, it will improve his supplication, his victory over his enemies, and his stature. Perhaps seeing fish indicates anxiety, sadness, and illness. Interpretation of a dream about fish: If the number of fish in a dream is known, then they are women, and if their number is not known, then they are money and spoils. The sea is king, and fish are the king’s army. If the fish is alive and fresh, it indicates a virgin servant, while the whale is the king’s servant, and whoever sees that he is catching a big fish, this indicates his benefit, and the best brown fish is a good indication for these. Whoever wants to get married, a dead fish in the sea is a bad sign in the sea or for someone who is sick, and whoever sees that he is eating live fish, he will reach the king even if he eats salty fish. He buys a slave or marries a woman, and if the fish moves from the sweet sea to the salt sea and the fish of the salt sea to the sweet, this indicates hypocrisy, and small and large fish show interest in joys and sorrows. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream Imam Ibn Sirin says in interpreting this dream that the fish when he ate it It was fresh and the number of fish in the dream was large, because the vision indicates a lot of money and spoils that the dreamer will seize in his life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating fish with a salty taste, then his vision indicates the distress and anxiety that befalls him. The man or young man who sees in his dream that he obtained one or two tender fish in his dream, then his vision indicates his marriage to one or two women. However, if the fish is small in size, The vision shows sadness overwhelming the dreamer, and God knows best. Imam Al-Nabulsi says in interpreting the vision of eating fish in a dream that the dream indicates money and livelihood that came in a legitimate and unexpected way and comes hastily and quickly without delay, or that the

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: It can cause a lot of psychological pressure on the dreamer, as the interpretation of the dream varies from one person to another and depends on the state of the vision and the dreamer, and from gptafser.com/ we will provide the interpretation of seeing a mother in a year in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream for a single girl if she sees An unmarried girl whose dead mother is alive in her dream. It indicates getting rid of problems and obstacles in her life and tangible changes. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream her dead mother giving birth to a beautiful girl. It symbolizes the fulfillment of her desires and desires that she has always dreamed of achieving. If an unmarried girl sees her dead mother giving birth to a beautiful girl. Her mother is dead and her eyes appear angry and sad. It indicates bad, undesirable behavior and the mother is dissatisfied with these actions. Some scholars interpreted the unmarried girl’s vision of her dead mother as being in light of the pressures and crises that exhaust the girl’s psyche and who wants to change her reality for the better. Seeing a dead mother in a dream One may mean that her marriage to a noble and rich man is approaching. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her dead mother alive in a dream. It symbolizes the solution of problems and the collapse of crises that she faced in Her life. If a married woman sees her mother dead, she looks at her with sadness and anger. This indicates that the behavior she is taking is wrong and that her mother does not love her. Her angry looks indicate that she is adjusting her behavior and realizes how wrong her leadership is. If a married woman sees her mother alive in a dream, and she has given birth to more than For a girl, it means that she will achieve what she desires and according to what she planned in advance. Seeing a mother smiling in a married dream shows her satisfaction and happiness with her marriage and there are no problems between them. If a married woman sees that her mother is dead, sick and unable to recover, this indicates the problems that she will face in the future. Her life. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man sees his mother dead in a dream, she has died again. It symbolizes that he will get a new job with a good position. A man seeing his mother crying loudly indicates that there are problems between him and his wife. But if A man sees his mother sad and crying, then this indicates the blessings that a person receives and her strength. If a man sees his mother giving birth in his dream, this indicates happiness and comfort in his life and the beautiful future that awaits him. Seeing a dead mother in a man’s dream, this is good news that his wife will become pregnant in the future. The relative. If a person sees his mother in a dream, do not pretend that she is in pain and that she is in good condition. This reflects the comfort that he feels in his life. As for the man who sees his mother dead in his sleep, it is a sign that what he was going to do has finished and he does not need to try. Read Also: Interpretation of seeing a dead or alive mother in a dream. The meaning of seeing a dead mother alive in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream her mother who was left alive, she listens to her, talks to her, and smiles. This indicates good things, extravagance and happiness, lack of sustenance and a lot of Money for the next child
